content.text:
Here is the memo wrapped in the requested output tags:

<OUTPUT_TEXT>
To: Logistics Training Department
From: Senior Logistician
Subject: Supporting Development of Training Materials and Technical Manuals

The Logistics department requests your support in developing new training materials and technical manuals for our logistics processes and systems. Please work with the logistics team leads to:

- Document step-by-step procedures for key logistics workflows 
- Create user guides with screenshots for our warehouse management and transportation management systems
- Develop training presentations and hands-on exercises to onboard new hires
- Establish a regular cadence to review and update materials as processes or systems change

Having comprehensive and up-to-date training content and documentation is critical for ensuring efficient operations, maintaining quality standards, and quickly getting new team members up to speed. Thank you in advance for your partnership on this important initiative. Please let me know if you have any questions or need any additional information from the Logistics team.
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
